sentences.en: Due to the obvious sensitivity of the issue he would not divulge any details.
sentences.cn: 由于该问题明显非常敏感，他不会透露任何细节。

sentences.en: He refused to divulge any information regarding the man's whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 关于这个人的下落他拒绝透露任何消息.

sentences.en: He swore never to divulge the secret.
I cannot divulge how much it cost.
sentences.cn: 我不能把价钱泄露出来.

sentences.en: I do not want to divulge where the village is.
sentences.cn: 我不想透露那个村庄在哪儿。

sentences.en: I'm not at liberty to divulge the contents of the message.
sentences.cn: 我不可以随便泄露这消息的内容.

sentences.en: Miss Fan said, " I can't divulge her secret. "
sentences.cn: 范小姐道: “ 我不能漏泄她的秘密. ”

sentences.en: Next, we thought of calling Wicklow in and making him divulge everything.
sentences.cn: 其次, 我们想到把威克鲁叫来,让他吐出一切秘密.

sentences.en: Officials refuse to divulge details of the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 官员们拒绝透露谈判的细节。

sentences.en: Police refused to divulge the identity of the suspect.
sentences.cn: 警方拒绝透露嫌疑犯的身份。

sentences.en: Shall I divulge how I truly lost my powers?
sentences.cn: 要我道出到底我是怎样真正丧失了我的法力 么 ?

sentences.en: Should he divulge Fix's real errand to his master?
sentences.cn: 路路通是否应该把这些事情告诉他的主人 呢 ?

sentences.en: So giant user group, once produce individual privacy to divulge, its harm nots allow to underestimate.
sentences.cn: 如此巨大的用户群体, 一旦发生个人隐私泄露, 其危害不容低估.

sentences.en: They refused to divulge where they had hidden the money.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝说出他们把钱藏在什么地方.

sentences.en: To divulge in a breach of confidence.

trans.tran_en: to give someone information that should be secret

trans.tran_cn: 泄露，暴露，揭发，<古>公布，宣布
trans.tran_en: to give someone information that should be secret
